name: Chaos Sect Axe
description: An axeman who accepted the call of Chaos and founded the Chaos Sect.
story: Following the end of the Archdemon War, the Church of Ilryos Axe suffered a difficult period of desolation, until the God of Chaos spoke to him. Inspired to found the Chaos Sect, he has found a new purpose to subdue the world under the blade of his axe.
get_line: A world governed by Chaos is coming!

relations.description: A violent Sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, and the first to stand in opposition to the Chaos Sect.
The Holy Order of the Blue Cross stand in the way of world domination by the Chaos Sect and must be eliminated.
The Heir of the Covenant stands in the way of world domination by the Chaos Sect and must be eliminated.
In order to expand the sect's influence into the Farche Frontier, a clash with this crazed evangelist is inevitable.

specialty.name: Some Doctrine
specialty.description: To end their suffering, they chose a doctrine of heresy.

type.name: Mission Impossible
type.description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.

skills.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

enhancements.description: Increases Health.
Increases Health by 2%.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 10%.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Disconnect, increases provoke effect chance.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Disconnect, increases provoke effect chance by 7%.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Disconnect, increases provoke effect chance by 15%.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Disconnect, increases provoke effect chance by 25%.
Increases Critical Hit Chance.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1%.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by 3%.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by 5%.
Increases Health.
Increases Health by 3%.
Increases Health by 8%.
Increases Health by 15%.
After using Attack Chain, has a chance to extend the duration of any immunity buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
After using Attack Chain, has a 10% chance to extend the duration of any immunity buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
After using Attack Chain, has a 25% chance to extend the duration of any immunity buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
After using Attack Chain, has a 50% chance to extend the duration of any immunity buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Increases Defense.
Increases Defense by 3%.
Increases Defense by 8%.
Increases Defense by 15%.
Increases Combat Readiness of all allies after being attacked by a Light elemental Hero.
Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 2% after being attacked by a Light elemental Hero.
Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 5% after being attacked by a Light elemental Hero.
Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 10% after being attacked by a Light elemental Hero.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Vigorous Strike, penetrates Defense by a certain amount.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Vigorous Strike, penetrates Defense by 5%.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Vigorous Strike, penetrates Defense by 20%.
When attacking a Light elemental target with Vigorous Strike, penetrates Defense by 40%.

When using Attack Chain, inflicts injuries on the target. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to a certain amount every time this skill is used.

When using Attack Chain, inflicts injuries on the target. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 2% every time this skill is used.

When using Attack Chain, inflicts injuries on the target. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 5% every time this skill is used.

When using Attack Chain, inflicts injuries on the target. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 10% every time this skill is used.
After being attacked, increases Attack of the caster. Effect can stack up to 5 times.
After being attacked, increases Attack of the caster by 1%. Effect can stack up to 5 times.
After being attacked, increases Attack of the caster by 3%. Effect can stack up to 5 times.
After being attacked, increases Attack of the caster by 6%. Effect can stack up to 5 times.

buffs.name: Immune
buffs.effect: Unaffected by debuffs and some harmful effects.

debuffs.name: Provoke
debuffs.effect: Target attacks the enemy who provoked them with a basic skill at the start of the turn.

localize.name: カオス教団 重斧総長

skill1.name: 分断
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、75%の確率で挑発を1ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 連鎖攻撃
skill2.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、自身に弱体効果免疫を1ターンの間付与する。
skill2.soul_description: 敵全体に攻撃し、自身に弱体効果免疫を1ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: 血気の一撃
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、80.0%の確率で防御力DOWNを2ターンの間付与し、自身の最大生命力の20％を回復する。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、追加ターンが発生する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
